309.0 (F43.21) With depressed mood: Low mood, tearfulness,
or feelings of hopelessness are predominant.
309.24 (F43.22) With anxiety: Nervousness, worry, jitteriness,
or separation anxiety is predominant.
309.28 (F43.23) With mixed anxiety and depressed mood: A
combination of depression and anxiety is predominant.
309.3 (F43.24) With disturbance of conduct: Disturbance of
conduct is predominant.
309.4 (F43.25) With mixed disturbance of emotions and con-
duct: Both emotional symptoms (e.g., depression, anxiety) and
a disturbance of conduct are predominant.
309.9 (F43.20) Unspecified: For maladaptive reactions that are
not classifiable as one of the specific subtypes of adjustment
disorder.
